name: Traps n' Treats
description:
Every year a group of children always take all the candy from a house, leaving none for anyone else!

This year the houseowner is having none of it, they're frantically placing traps and other obstacles to try stop the children.

However, the children have a secret weapon!.. they've repurposed some jack-o-lanterns into bombs!

Can the children grab all the candy before the night is over or will the houseowner stop them? Find out in this Halloween Themed Party Game!

Join our Discord Server for news, devlogs, and early access of future games!

Credits

A Netal game:

Coding, "Voice Acting" - Nettakrim
Art - Walex
Music - The Other Guy

Sound Effects Used: Spiketrap, Sword Draw and Sheath, Jawharp Boing, Ruler Twangs, Flamethrower, Pop, Drill, Evil Laugh
Fonts Used: Oxanium, Custom Font "RedWixel" - Walex
